markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Call of the Green Man](/Feats.aspx?ID=4508) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Leshy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=225" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 69 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

You can call forth nearby nature spirits to augment your body. Once per day, you can cast [plant form](/Spells.aspx?ID=223) as a 5th-rank primal [innate spell](/Rules.aspx?ID=279). When you reach 17th level, you can heighten the spell to 6th rank when you cast it.
name: Call of the Green Man

summary_markdown: You can call forth nearby nature spirits to augment your body.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 13" pfs="Standard" > Call of the Green Man Source Player Core pg. 69 2.0 --- You can call forth nearby nature spirits to augment your body. Once per day, you can cast plant form as a 5th-rank primal innate spell. When you reach 17th level, you can heighten the spell to 6th rank when you cast it.
